com.doitnext.swing.widgets.json
Class JSONEditPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.doitnext.swing.widgets.json.JSONEditPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class JSONEditPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Implements the embeddable swing widget for editing JSON. This class is not thread safe.

Constructor Detail

JSONEditPanel

public JSONEditPanel()

Method Detail

addTreeSelectionListener

public void addTreeSelectionListener(javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionListener tsl)

setJson

public void setJson(java.lang.String json,
                    JSONEditPanel.UpdateType updateType)
Replaces the current tree structure in the contained JTree component with a new structure built from the JSON string provided.

Parameters:
json - - the JSON to update the tree control with
updateType - - if a node is selected when this method is called then the updateType indicates where the new json goes: REPLACE - replace current selected node with new JSON INSERT - place node before selected node APPEND - place node after selected node AS_CHILD - append to end of child nodes or insert new child node if no children present. Selected node must be of type ARRAY or OBJECT

renameNode

public void renameNode()
Renames the selected node if it is a renameable node.

deleteNode

public void deleteNode()
Deletes selected node or sets entire model to null if root node or no node is selected.

getJson

public java.lang.String getJson()
Returns the current JSON from the JTree

Returns:
the JSON as it is represented by the current state of the Tree model
